name: NeverTouchTheGround (OrTheWalls) (OrTheCeiling)
description:
In 'NeverTouchTheGround(OrTheWalls)(OrTheCeiling)', the main objective is, as the name of the game implies, to Never Touch The Ground, Or The Walls, Or The Ceiling. As the game progresses, the levels become more difficult to pass, so you have to be focused.

Use A & D for moving and the mouse for jumping and gliding.

If you find any errors, do not hesitate to write a comment explaining what happened.
